org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers

Interface DatacenterBroker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatacenterBrokerSimple, NetDatacenterBroker, PowerDatacenterBroker

    public interface DatacenterBroker
    DatacentreBroker represents a broker acting on behalf of a user. It hides VM management, as vm creation, submission of cloudlets to VMs and destruction of VMs.
    Author:
    Manoel Campos da Silva Filho

    • Method Summary

      • bindCloudletToVm

        void bindCloudletToVm(int cloudletId,
                      int vmId)
        Specifies that a given cloudlet must run in a specific virtual machine.
        Parameters:
        cloudletId - ID of the cloudlet being bount to a vm
        vmId - the vm id
        Precondition:
        cloudletId > 0, id > 0
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • submitCloudletList

        void submitCloudletList(List<? extends Cloudlet> list)
        Sends a list of cloudlets to the broker for further creation of each one in some Vm. The cloudlets will be added to the getCloudletsWaitingList().
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        Precondition:
        list !=null
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • submitVmList

        void submitVmList(List<? extends Vm> list)
        This method is used to send to the broker the list with virtual machines that must be created.
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        Precondition:
        list !=null
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • hasMoreCloudletsToBeExecuted

        boolean hasMoreCloudletsToBeExecuted()
        Indicates if there are more cloudlets waiting to be executed yet.
        Returns:
        true if there are waiting cloudlets, false otherwise
